<Frame Padding="0" BackgroundColor="{StaticResource Green}" CornerRadius="5" WidthRequest="260" HeightRequest="60" HorizontalOptions="CenterAndExpand" Margin="10" > <Entry Text="{Binding FineValue, Converter={StaticResource currencyConverter}}" Keyboard="Numeric" TextColor="{StaticResource White}"/> </Frame> <Label HorizontalOptions="CenterAndExpand" Text="Digite o valor da multa" TextColor="White" Margin="10,0,10,10" IsVisible="{Binding IsPayment}"/>
